name: Tempest Citadel
description: Tempest Citadel is a base building simulation set on a storm-ruled planet with a vivid sci-fi story. Build a mighty Citadel in the clouds for your crew of explorers and conquer the deadly planet below in automated squad battles!
minimum_requirements: OS: WinXP Processor: 1.0 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9c compatible 3D Graphics Card with Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
